pull.title: scripted-diff: Remove unused leading newline in RPC docs
pull.body:
It is harmless, but newlines in the beginning read a bit odd ("nReturns"). So just require them to not be present.

The diff is large, but a trivial scripted-diff.

verification.payload:
tree e1a0d8a80e45b0a7b7cd03c540b7ae2589520700
parent 31d3eebfb92ae0521e18225d69be95e78fb02672
author MarcoFalke <*~=`'#}+{/-|&$^_@721217.xyz> 1747314917 +0200
committer MarcoFalke <*~=`'#}+{/-|&$^_@721217.xyz> 1747315691 +0200

scripted-diff: Remove unused leading newline in RPC docs

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
 perl -0777 -pi -e 's/RPCHelpMan{\s*("[^"]+"),\s*"\\n/RPCHelpMan{\n        \1,\n        "/g' $( git grep -l 'RPCHelpMan{' )
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-

events.message:

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-

-END VERIFY SCRIPT-

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#30886](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30886) (rpc: Add support to populate PSBT input utxos via rpc by instagibbs)
* [#29415](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29415) (Broadcast own transactions only via short-lived Tor or I2P connections by vasild)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
